title: This is AmeriKKKa
itunes:title: This is AmeriKKKa
description:
This episode of course we had to discuss the chaos and terrorism that errupted yesterday at the Capitol. We opened the phone lines for our listeners to hear their thoughts on the Trump supporter better known as the terrorist taking over the Capitol. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to America for their action and reactions. Also, Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee" with one having hard time dealing with his brother having relations with his girlfriend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
